task.title: Create a Topic in a Map

taskbody.context: To add a topic to a DITA map, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Select a node of a map open in the DITA Maps Manager View.

Run the Insert Reference action. It is available in the DITA Maps Manager view's toolbar, in the main menu under the DITA Maps submenu, and in the contextual menu under the Insert Append Child (when you want to insert a topic reference as a child of the currently selected topic) and Insert Insert After (when you want to insert a topic reference as a sibling of the currently selected topic) submenus.
In the displayed dialog box select a topic file.
Press the Insert button or the Insert and close button.
step.stepresult: A reference to the selected topic is added to the current map in the view.

step.cmd: If you clicked the Insert button you can continue inserting new topic references using the Insert button repeatedly.
Close the dialog using the Close button.
